245.sentence: It is a wonderful little router .

246.sentence: Connection speed to the other 2 machines seems awesome - much quicker than the router I replaced , and when combined with the simplicity of the Valet Plus , this makes for a great product .

247.sentence: Connection speed to the other 2 machines seems awesome - much quicker than the router I replaced , and when combined with the simplicity of the Valet Plus , this makes for a great product .

248.sentence: This router is the best I have used to date .

249.sentence: However , if speed , reliability , and power to transmit a signal across the house are your requirements , then this router will do the job .

252.sentence: Worked great until the new firmware that installs SecureSpot .

253.sentence: Worked great until the new firmware that installs SecureSpot .

254.sentence: When the SecureSpot free trial finishes , they ask you to buy it and when you do n't , it stops working well .

255.sentence: Even when you disable SecureSpot completely , it will upon reboot keep saying your computer is new even when it is n't and force you to tell it that your computer is authorized .

256.sentence: You ca n't , that `` upgrade '' is irreversible .

257.sentence: D-Link got greedy and in trying to sell you their pathetic extras made the product unusable .

258.sentence: D-Link got greedy and in trying to sell you their pathetic extras made the product unusable .

259.sentence: Setup was easy -LRB- Windows XP wired , Windows 7 Professional wifi -RRB- .

260.sentence: I followed the easy instructions in the manual , and once online at the router 's login , there is a setup Wizard which will work with your OS if you choose to use it .

261.sentence: I just set it up manually , which is very easy .

262.sentence: The router recognized my other wifi devices easily , and further setup was a breeze .

263.sentence: My Linksys froze for 30 minutes or longer when applying changes .

264.sentence: I 'm very happy with this router , and would recommend it .

265.sentence: Update : I 've been using this router for 3 months and it 's still working very well - wifi remains strong and consistant .

266.sentence: I remain extremely pleased with this router !

267.sentence: It works fine but performance is no better than my old SMC G 54mbs .

268.sentence: It works fine but performance is no better than my old SMC G 54mbs .

269.sentence: First thing I tested was the speed , and I have to say it was abysmal .

270.sentence: Hooked up to the D-Link extreme N , connected speed dropped to 18mbps and wireless down to 8mbps .

271.sentence: At first I dealt with this as 18mbps was still REALLY fast .

272.sentence: The next day , I turned on my laptop and it connected to the network , but no internet connection .

274.sentence: Not cheap but not expensive either .
